issue.title: youtube.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [http://youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fyoutube.com) ### Comment > For the last couple of days I've noticed a significant slowdown in loading Youtube pages with AdGuard enabled. I've updated all filters, but the apparent deliberate slowness does not go away unless I disable AdGuard and then Youtube appears to load correctly. Often it will take 5-10secs to load a specific page. Processor usage for the Youtube specific page within Safari is also going beyond 100% during the attempts to load the site. ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/84tboe1v5e04k4sswocccc4g4kswgs8jriysdps2xc.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Safari v1.11.16 System version: | MacOS 14.2.1 Filters: | Ad Blocking:

issue.title: visortmo.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://visortmo.com/populars?page=5](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fvisortmo.com%2Fpopulars%3Fpage%3D5) ### Comment > This small box is the result of a blocking rule (I don't know what it is). I should clarify that in the private DNS of AdGuard I have the rules: chatango.* and chatbro.*, it may be related and that's why I mention it, those domains are from those online chats that have old aesthetics from the Internet Explorer era but are still used by webs. I mention it because it may be that. > > That huge ad that appears above the box I am pointing out has already been reported (I have seen it twice) to AdGuard but it seems that they don't pay attention to it and just ignore it, if someone is so kind to tell me where the box I am pointing out comes from I would be satisfied. ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/6tzgpakydkkc88cg4wwww80wkwksswc70mluavo6rg.jpg?nc=1)

comment.body: @Alex-302 Проблема наблюдается в разных браузерах (проверка перехода через смену браузера по умолчанию) и как минимум ещё на одном телефоне. Только по ссылкам Все инструменты. В комментариях как то писали про это при использовании блокировщика.

comment.body:
Hello,

I have again the same problem. 
How can I exclude this from apple?

￼

Sakis Glaveris
Commercial Manager

￼

Laertou 22 | Capital Trade Center | Block C
55 535 Thessaloniki
+(30) 2311 824060 (ext. 512)

25 Ιαν 2024, 11:57, ο χρήστης «Alex ***@***.***>» έγραψε:


@sakis697 <https://github.com/sakis697>
Login to adguard-dns.io

Go to the server settings

Details
